resources.string: TapTap 無障礙設定\n\n重要提示: 應用不會收集您的個資，此服務僅用於辨識手勢活動並提供與裝置的互動支援
設定使用手勢時要執行的動作
停用手勢在某些情況下被識別並激活動作
選擇機器學習組件使用的裝置模型
使用手勢並執行動作時振動一次
當熒幕關閉時喚醒設備 (注意：這會干擾關閉熒幕的操作!)
當手機插入充電時，暫時停用手勢半秒
當手機通話時，停用手勢. 僅支援標準電話 - 不支援網路電話 如. WhatsApp
當有 USB 設備插入時，停用手勢半秒鐘。例如：U盤插入
當相機啓動時停用手勢. 注意：這將在執行動作時跳過「啟動相機」動作.
當熒幕關閉狀態停用手勢
在屏幕上顯示前台應用時停用手勢
當 %1s 處於前台運行時，暫時停用手勢
啓動默認相機應用. 如果相機已經在運行，這個操作將會跳過.
通過模擬按下最近任務鍵來打開最近任務。在支持此功能的設備上，若最近任務已經處於打開狀態，則使用此動作會切換至第一個後台應用
使用系統擷取熒幕畫面
模擬按下電源鍵鎖定熒幕
打開電筒. 當相機被占用，此操作失效.
啓動 %1s. 當該應用已處於運行狀態時，此動作將被跳過.
Sensitivity is not currently implemented in Google\'s code that this app uses. I\'m actively looking into how it might be possible, and it may become available in a future version.

Actions are tasks that are run when you tap the back of your device twice. Actions are run in the order of the list - top to bottom. If an action is able to run successfully, no further actions will be run. However, if an action is unavailable (eg. if the assistant for a "Launch assistant" action is already running), the next action below it will be run, and so on until one is run successfully.\n\nIn future versions of this app, you will be able to add gates to actions (see the Gates menu of the app) to allow for more control of when certain actions are run.

Gates are situations that can block the gesture from running any actions. In order for any action to be run, all the enabled gates must be open.\nIf a scenario is currently met, for example if the screen is off and the "Display off" gate is enabled, no actions will be run. You can add as many gates as you like, and enable/disable them using the toggles (rather than having to delete and re-add) to make configuration quicker and easier.
Advanced actions such as Tasker integration are coming soon!
The gesture will not currently work. Tap to enable
If you want to disable the gesture, tap to disable the service
Select "Tap, Tap" from the accessibility service list, toggle it and return to Tap, Tap to continue
This app is in Alpha. Tap for info.

This app is in the early stages of development and has been released in an "Alpha" state to allow for testing on lots of devices. If you encounter a bug, please report it on the GitHub as an issue. If you would like to request a feature, post it on the XDA thread or request it on GitHub.

Check back on XDA, either on Labs or in the thread, for updates as soon as they're available.

Thank you for your patience during development.
Created by Kieron Quinn / Quinny899 @ XDA
